definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
cube root/to extract a cube root

sentences.english: This is ten to the 12, right? It's still a huge variance.
sentences.chinese: 這是十的12次方，對嗎？它仍然是個巨大的變量。

sentences.english: a to the b where b is an integer.
sentences.chinese: 也就是a的b次方，而b是個正整數。

sentences.english: This function solves a standard quadratic equation .
sentences.chinese: 這個函數求解一個標準的二次方程。

sentences.english: The expression of the long-term optical-beam spreading radius is obtained by a quadratic approximation.
sentences.chinese: 通過二次方近似得到了長期光束擴展半徑表達式。

sentences.english: So B is approximately A0 e to the minus k2 times time.
sentences.chinese: 那麼B大約是A0，e的負k2乘以時間次方。

sentences.english: So, the execution time grows cubically as a function of the number of assets.
sentences.chinese: 所以，執行時間隨資產數量的三次方增長。

sentences.english: It is found that the third power of the average grain orientation angle also decreases linearly with increasing distance.
sentences.chinese: 晶粒平均取向角的三次方隨距離的增加而線性地減小。

sentences.english: And that's just little q configurational to the Nth power.
sentences.chinese: 就等於構型的小q的N次方。

sentences.english: This thing does 2 gig worth of operations.
You can be solving quadratic equations at the same time if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡的話，你可以一邊穿鞋一邊解二次方程。

sentences.english: Most quadratic equations have two different solutions.
sentences.chinese: 大部分二次方程式都有兩個不同的解。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 將連接的三次方貝茲曲線序列加入至目前的圖形。

sentences.english: I like the angstrom. It is 10 to the minus 10 meters.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡單位，埃，它等於10的負10次方米。

sentences.english: Given a response surface equation in quadratic form, the Six Sigma.
sentences.chinese: 給出一個二次方程式形式的響應曲面公式。

sentences.english: The E-filed intensity decays 60 dB per decade of distance from source current. (3).
sentences.chinese: 電場強度隨電流之距離爲三次方遞減。

sentences.english: Next time through the loop it goes to a cubed.
sentences.chinese: 然後再一次循環變成a的三次方。

definition: the factorial of a number, e.g. 5! = 5.4.3.2.1 = 120
to square a number/to calculate the square
cube root/to extract a cube root
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)
